flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light.
Swarms of this POKMON are attracted
by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the
leaves off roadside trees for food.

When DUSTOX flaps its wings, a fine
dust is scattered all over. This dust is
actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick.
This POKMON searches for food using
its antennae like radar.

It is a nocturnal POKMON that flies from
fields and mountains to the attraction of
streetlights at night. It looses highly
toxic powder from its wings.

It scatters horribly toxic dust when it
senses danger. They tend to gather in the
glow of streetlamps at night.

It scatters horribly toxic dust when it
senses danger. They tend to gather in the
glow of streetlamps at night.

A nocturnal Pokmon. Drawn by
streetlights, they messily eat the
leaves of trees lining boulevards.

It violently flutters its wings to
scatter toxic dust when attacked.
It becomes active after sunset.

Toxic powder is scattered with each
flap. At night, it is known to strip
leaves off trees lining boulevards.

It scatters its fine dust all over
when it is attacked. It is a
nocturnal Pokmon.

It scatters its fine dust all over
when it is attacked. It is a
nocturnal Pokmon.

Il disperse un nuage de poudre
toxique  chaque coup daile. Il
aime les feuilles darbres urbains.

Toxic powder is scattered with each
flap. At night, it is known to strip
leaves off trees lining boulevards.

Il disperse un nuage de poudre
toxique  chaque coup daile. Il
aime les feuilles darbres urbains.

Toxic powder is scattered with each
flap. At night, it is known to strip
leaves off trees lining boulevards.

Toxic powder is scattered with each
flap. At night, it is known to strip
leaves off trees lining boulevards.

Toxic powder is scattered with each
flap. At night, it is known to strip
leaves off trees lining boulevards.

Ce Pokmon nocturne est attir par les lueurs de
la ville et aime les feuilles des arbres urbains.

Nachtaktives Pokmon, das vom Licht der Stadt
angezogen wird und dort die Bltter der Bume frisst.

Pokmon nocturno. Atrado por las luces de la ciudad,
se come las hojas y arbustos de las avenidas.

Pokmon notturno. Attirato dalla luce dei lampioni,
divora le foglie degli alberi lungo i viali.

A nocturnal Pokmon. Drawn by streetlights, they
messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.

Quand on lattaque, il bat des ailes pour rpandre sa
poudre toxique. Il sort aprs le coucher du soleil.

Wird es angegriffen, flattert es mit den Flgeln
und verteilt giftigen Puder. Es ist nachtaktiv.

Cuando se le ataca, bate las alas con fuerza para
esparcir polvo txico. Es un Pokmon nocturno.

Se attaccato, sbatte con forza le ali e sparge una
polvere tossica. Lo si vede in giro dopo il tramonto.

It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust
when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.

Papinox est instinctivement attir par la lumire. Des nues
de ce Pokmon sont attires par les rverbres des villes,
o il sme la pagaille en grignotant les feuilles des arbres
en bordure de route.

Pudox wird instinktiv vom Licht angezogen. In hell
erleuchteten Stdten kann man Scharen dieser Pokmon
dabei beobachten, wie sie groen Schaden anrichten,
indem sie die Bltter von Bumen abfressen.

Los Dustox se acercan a la luz de forma instintiva. De hecho,
se agrupan en enjambres alrededor de las luces de las
ciudades y causan estragos en las hojas de los rboles que
estn a pie de calle para alimentarse.

Dustox  istintivamente attratto dalla luce. Nugoli di questi
Pokmon sono attirati dalla luce intensa delle citt, dove
causano danni ingenti strappando le foglie delle piante
di cui si nutrono lungo le strade urbane.

Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokmon
are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak
havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.

Lorsque Papinox bat des ailes, une lgre poussire
se rpand. Cette poussire est en fait un puissant poison
capable de mettre au tapis un boxeur professionnel.
Ce Pokmon cherche sa nourriture avec ses antennes,
comme un radar.

Wenn Pudox mit den Flgeln schlgt, verteilt es einen
feinen Puder. Es handelt sich um ein starkes Gift,
das sogar einen Profiboxer umhauen wrde. Bei der
Futtersuche benutzt dieses Pokmon seine Antennen
als Radar.

Cuando Dustox bate las alas, libera un polvillo fino que en
realidad es un peligroso veneno que puede resultar daino
hasta al ms fuerte de los fuertes. Las antenas le sirven de
radar para buscar comida.

Quando agita le ali, Dustox sparge una polvere sottile
tuttintorno. In realt si tratta di un potente veleno capace
di mettere al tappeto anche un campione di lotta libera.
Per cercare il cibo usa le antenne come un radar.

When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over.
This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a
pro wrestler sick. This Pokmon searches for food using its
antennae like radar.

Tends to be drawn to bonfires on dark nights. Difficult to chase
away from settlements because of the way it scatters highly
toxic scales.
